personal.name: Irvin M. Cruz-Rodriguez
personal.tagline: AI should automate the meaningless so humans can amplify the meaningful.
personal.bio: I build systems that actually make work easier. Most teams waste hours on repetitive tasks—email sorting, data entry, document processing, follow-ups—work that steals time from strategy and growth. I design AI workflows and multi-agent systems that eliminate that friction. The proof: 40% less manual work at FutureCrafters. $2.1M revenue influenced at Michaelis Events. 8x digital sales growth at Disney. I'm a Certified Chief AI Officer working with teams that are done managing chaos and ready to focus on what matters.

businesses.name: AI Systems Architecture
businesses.description: Your team wastes hours on repetitive tasks that software should handle. I build custom GPTs, workflow automation, and multi-agent systems that eliminate that friction. Best for teams ready to implement now.

businesses.name: Fractional Chief AI Officer
businesses.description: You need strategic AI leadership but can't justify a full-time hire. I provide governance frameworks, roadmaps, vendor evaluation, and executive guidance as an ongoing partner. Best for organizations scaling AI adoption across departments.

businesses.name: 30-Day AI Transformation Blueprint
businesses.description: You know AI can help but don't know where to start. This diagnostic sprint maps exactly where AI eliminates bottlenecks in your operations and delivers a prioritized roadmap with vendor recommendations. Best for leaders exploring options without wasting time on guesswork.

projects.name: NewsGen AI
projects.description: From headline to article in one click. AI-powered platform that transforms news headlines into publication-ready articles in 10-15 seconds, reducing content creation time from hours to seconds.
keyFeatures: Real-time news search across thousands of sources
Article management with gallery and list views

projects.name: Website Prospector
projects.description: AI-powered lead generation tool that discovers and qualifies potential clients by analyzing websites and digital presence. Automates prospect research and outreach preparation.

projects.name: FutureCrafters — Five-Agent Orchestration System
projects.description: Multi-agent AI ecosystem for operational intelligence and execution. Built a five-agent orchestration system with specialized roles: Sol (Orchestrator & Project Manager) for memory & continuity management, Gigawatt (Prompt Engineer) for prompt architecture, Cipher (SOP Analyst) for process documentation, Nexus (Network Intelligence) for relationship mapping with 929 contacts, and Rory (Content Alchemist) for thought leadership production. Plus 12+ custom GPTs for specialized workflows.
keyFeatures: Sol: Memory & continuity management across sessions, active projects folder tracking, daily briefing intelligence, security & trust hierarchy enforcement
Gigawatt: Prompt architecture and optimization, agent design and system planning, technical specifications
Cipher: Process documentation and analysis, transcript analysis and insight extraction, workflow mapping
Nexus: LinkedIn connection analysis (929 contacts mapped), relationship intelligence and opportunity surfacing
Rory: Thought leadership content production, voice modeling and brand consistency, multi-platform content strategy
12+ custom GPTs for specialized workflows (email drafting, research synthesis, proposal generation)
40% manual effort reduction through intelligent automation
Zero context loss through memory and checkpoint protocols
Proactive intelligence surfacing opportunities before requested
Scalable operations with specialized agents handling distinct domains
projects.challenge: Building FutureCrafters required operational intelligence across memory management, active project tracking, workflow orchestration, strategic analysis, and content production—tasks requiring different AI capabilities and specializations.
projects.solution: Built a five-agent orchestration system with specialized roles for memory management, prompt engineering, SOP analysis, network intelligence, and content production, plus 12+ custom GPTs for specialized workflows.

projects.name: FutureCrafters AI Governance & Ethics System
projects.description: Production governance framework for responsible AI adoption and risk management. Comprehensive governance system for AI implementation covering: data privacy protocols, security standards, human-in-the-loop checkpoints, ethical decision frameworks, bias detection processes, accountability structures, and trust hierarchy enforcement. Used internally for all FutureCrafters AI deployments and offered to clients as part of fractional CAIO and strategic AI leadership engagements.
keyFeatures: Data privacy protocols and security standards

caseStudies.title: AI-Enabled Lead Conversion Engine
caseStudies.description: Scoped and led full system development with dev team: Complete brand refresh and visual identity redesign, WordPress website rebuild from ground up, client portal system built and connected to GoHighLevel CRM, multi-step lead generation funnel with automated lead capture/scoring/nurture, integration architecture using GoHighLevel + Zapier + Make for seamless automation, full funnel orchestration from first touch to booking conversion. Results: 15+ hours/week saved, 40% reduction in manual effort, 30% increase in corporate client acquisition, 25% boost in repeat bookings, 15% improvement in lead-to-booking conversion.

caseStudies.title: Multi-Agent Document Automation System
caseStudies.description: Built five-agent orchestration system: Sol (memory/project management) for continuity management and active project tracking, Gigawatt (prompt engineering) for prompt architecture and optimization, Cipher (SOP analysis) for process documentation and workflow mapping, Nexus (network intelligence) with 929 contacts mapped for relationship intelligence, Rory (content production) for thought leadership and brand consistency, plus 12+ custom GPTs for specialized workflows. Results: 40% manual effort reduction, 25% engagement lift, zero context loss through memory protocols, proactive intelligence surfacing opportunities.

caseStudies.title: Digital Operations Optimization
caseStudies.description: Led cross-functional digital programs aligning Marketing, Digital, and Technology teams. Delivered platform integrations across mobile and e-commerce systems, streamlined program coordination, clarified dependencies to accelerate delivery cadence. Results: 20% guest satisfaction increase through improved digital experience, 8x online sales growth via optimized e-commerce integration, 90% delivery time reduction through better coordination, 50% engagement lift from streamlined processes.

caseStudies.title: Organic Growth Engine
caseStudies.description: Designed a 360° brand identity and digital presence with AI-assisted content strategy and automated workflows.

timeline.description: $2.1M revenue influence through AI adoption & automation workflows. Built first marketing team and implemented AI-powered lead conversion systems.

timeline.title: Bachelor's degree, Multi/Interdisciplinary Studies

leadMagnet.title: AI Readiness Checklist
leadMagnet.tagline: Find out where AI can help in under 5 minutes.
leadMagnet.description: A practical checklist that shows you where your team is losing time to repetitive work and where AI can help. No jargon, no hype. Just a clear map of what's possible and what to do next.

seo.title: Irvin Cruz — AI Workflow Specialist & Certified Chief AI Officer
seo.description: Irvin Cruz designs ethical, production-ready AI workflows, branded GPTs, and automation systems that reduce manual work and unlock scalable operations.
